All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class DeckController extends PageController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class DeckController is the class responsible for managing the deck.fxml file

    • setCards

      public void setCards(PlayerData[] players, boolean lastRound)
      The setCards method is used when a game is reopened and when an UpdateChosenCard is sent to the client
      Parameters:

    • selectCard

      public void selectCard(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      The method selectCard is called whenever an ImageView containing a card is selected. It creates a message ChosenCardMessage that is sent to the ServerHandler via a firePropertyChange method
      See Also:
      • ChosenCardMessage

    • goToGameBoard

      public void goToGameBoard(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The method is called when a specific button is clicked. It sets the currScene to GameBoard.fxml where the player can see the entire Game Board
